eheth dhanapathi ka්ramaye sarabhutha pa්rathirodhayan - goliya parimanayakin anyeanya washayen parayaththa wu aarthikayak ha yal pinu dhanapathi jathika rajya paddhathiya athara da, koti ganan manushya pa්rajawage sha්rama shakthiya ha weli gath samaja nishpadanaye lokawyaptha jalayak ha nishpadana margawala paudgalika ayithiya athara da, bahujana samajaye awashyatha ha thani thani dhanapathinge mudal gara ganime aathmarthakami uthsukayan athara da wana pa්rathirodhayan - dan lahilahiye langa wemin pawathinne, dhaneshwara ka්ramayata erehi kamkaru panthi wiruddhathwaya thawaduratath mada pawathwima nokalahaki thanakataya.
